\subsection{Detailed Description}
Initialize and clean-\/up the p\-O\-S\-K\-I library. This module implements the library initialization and clean-\/up.

The library checks for an environment variable, whose name is defined by the compile-\/time macros P\-O\-S\-K\-I\-\_\-\-L\-O\-G\-\_\-\-F\-I\-L\-E, and P\-O\-S\-K\-I\-\_\-\-M\-E\-S\-S\-A\-G\-E\-\_\-\-L\-E\-V\-E\-L, for reporting messages.

Also, refer \hyperlink{poski__LogFileHandler_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Log\-File\-Handler.\-c} \hyperlink{poski__MessageHandler_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Message\-Handler.\-c}

(2) set P\-O\-S\-K\-I\-\_\-\-M\-E\-S\-S\-A\-G\-E\-\_\-\-L\-E\-V\-E\-L

(3) check system configuration
